parse: Conjunctive waw, Preposition | Noun - proper - feminine singular
str2: En-rimmon -- 'spring of a pomegranate', a place in Judah

parse: Conjunctive waw, Preposition-b | Noun - proper - feminine singular
str2: Zorah -- a city exchanged by Judah and Dan

parse: Conjunctive waw, Preposition-b | Noun - proper - feminine singular
str2: Jarmuth -- a Canaanite city in Judah, also a city in Issachar
